page.title: 20Quality of life - Lullington
page.content:
A survey conducted to investigate the views of Lullington residents regarding their enviroment revealed that all are very happy with the quiet, rural lifestyle the area provides. Only 3 of the 20 people interviewed complained of the lack of facilities. A questionnaire prepared for 30 pupils aged 11-12 resulted in different opinions. Each was asked to give his/her opinion on feelings experienced on the field visit on a scale of 1 to 5.
1 2 3 4 5 Friendly 6 17 5 2 0 Unfriendly Peaceful 25 3 2 0 0 Chaotic Well kept 26 4 0 0 0 Badly kept Clean 21 8 1 0 0 Polluted Too old 5 12 13 0 0 New Interesting 6 8 11 3 2 Boring
